author: igors
msg: Taken care of simple types derived from base types (not enumerations)
Previously such derived types were not registered for deserialization,
so when a SOAP reply comes with myLong it would result in a failure.

author: dims
msg: Throw "Method not found" when we finish iterating through the method array and did not find anything suitable. Right now there is a ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException if the method is not found in the array for some reason.

author: glyn
msg: Prevent cookie2 from being incorrectly carried from request to request.

author: dims
msg: - java.protocol.handler.pkgs entries need to be separated by '|'

author: gdaniels
msg: Fix typo causing getSerializerForJavaType() to always return null.
